0010100011111001 1001011011011110 1 -> sum: 1011111111011000, cout: 0
1101011011010101 1001101000011110 1 -> sum: 0111000011110100, cout: 1

0011110011000100 0001101001010000 1 -> sum: 0101011100010101, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
